mapper.select: SELECT loan_num, loan_name, loan_amount, loan_period, loan_overrate, loan_rate, loan_moderate, loan_target, loan_reMethod, loan_paymethod, loan_regDate FROM loanproduct_tbl ORDER BY loan_num DESC
SELECT loan_num, loan_name, loan_amount, loan_period, loan_overrate, loan_rate, loan_moderate, loan_target, loan_reMethod, loan_paymethod, loan_regDate FROM loanproduct_tbl WHERE loan_num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into myloanaccount_tbl(myLoan_account, loan_num, myLoan_amount, c_id,myLoan_rate, myLoan_left) values(#{myLoan_account},#{loan_num},#{myLoan_amount},#{c_id},#{myLoan_rate},#{myLoan_left})
mapper.update: update myloanaccount_tbl set myLoan_left = #{myLoan_left} where myLoan_account = #{myLoan_account}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loanproduct_tbl(loan_num, loan_name, loan_amount, loan_period, loan_rate, loan_moderate, loan_target, loan_reMethod) VALUES(loanPro_seq.nextval, #{loan_name}, #{loan_amount}, #{loan_period}, #{loan_rate}, #{loan_moderate},#{loan_target},#{loan_reMethod})
